de.weltraumschaf.dht.shell

Class InteractiveShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.dht.shell.InteractiveShell

  • public class InteractiveShell
extends Object
    Implements a simple REPL shell.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
